subtasks.name: Governance Upgrade - Auto-Harden & Auto-Govern Rules
subtasks.objective: Propose next set of Auto-Harden and Auto-Govern rules for external enterprise deployment

rules: All API endpoints require OAuth2 / JWT authentication
All data transmission must use TLS 1.3 encryption
Rate limiting: 100 requests/minute per API key
SQL injection prevention: Parameterized queries mandatory
XSS prevention: Content Security Policy enforcement
CSRF protection: SameSite cookie enforcement
Secrets management: All credentials in environment variables
Audit logging: All user actions logged with timestamps
Personal data: GDPR compliance, right to erasure
Payment data: PCI-DSS compliance, no storage of card details
Access control: Role-based (Admin, User, Guest)
Data retention: 7 years for financial records, 30 days for logs
Backup: Daily encrypted backups with off-site replication
Incident response: 1-hour detection, 4-hour remediation SLA
System uptime: 99.9% SLA target
Performance: API responses < 200ms p95
Error rates: < 0.1% of all requests
Auto-scaling: Scale up on 70% CPU, scale down on 30%
Health checks: Every 10 seconds on all services
Alerting: Critical > Warning > Info severity levels

output_specification.deliverable: Complete governance framework for enterprise deployment
